page.title: 03St.Peters,Prickwillow
page.content: Mr Stacey is Churchwarden at St.Peters and told us about how the Church was used. 'Although we have a Parish Church the people who come on Sunday is low. The Church shares its Vicar with another two Parishes. We see him normaly for one hour each month. We miss the village Vicar as we used to have a congregation of fifty or more. We only get this number on Festivals like the{ {Harvest Supper}held in the{Village {Hall}or the{Plough Service.' 'The Church Spire is being repaired at the moment and we have already raised{eleven hundred pounds}in four months. It will cost{three thousand {pounds}to repair; we will raise the money easily. There is no Sunday school but the Curate who takes the other services plays the guitar in the Family Services.
